cows.name: Gir
cows.about: Originated in Gir forests of South Kathiawar in Gujarat also found in Maharashtra and adjacent Rajasthan

cows.name: Red Sindhi
cows.about: Originated in Karachi and Hyderabad (Pakistan) regions of undivided India and also reared in certain organized farms in our country.

cows.name: Sahiwal
cows.about: Originated from the former princely state of Vijayanagarm, presently part of Karnataka.

cows.name: Amritmahal
cows.about: Originated in Hassan, Chikmagalur and Chitradurga district of Karnataka.

cows.name: Khillaril
cows.about: Originated from Sholapur and Sitapur districts of Maharashtra.

cows.name: Kangayam
cows.about: Originated in Kangayam, Dharapuram, Perundurai, Erode, Bhavani and part of Gobichettipalayam taluk of Erode and Coimbatore district.

cows.name: Bargur
cows.about: Found around Bargur hills in Bhavani taluk of Erode district in Tamilnadu.

cows.name: Umblachery
cows.about: Originated inThanjavur, Thiruvarur and Nagappattinam districts of Tamil Nadu.

cows.name: Pulikulam
cows.about: This breed is commonly seen in cumbum valley of Madurai district in Tamil Nadu.
